column4: i'd like to be able to copy paste from the terminal without having to right click, is this possible?
ctrl+c cancels current operation, it doesnt copy
you dont happen to know how to clear the terminal (i.e not typing clear, but actually clear the console with keyboard  shortcut)
you can then kil the pid, or you can run:  sudo service mysql stop
without installing the browser you won't have the binary, so there is no 'alternative' that simple
im asking for the source code for /sbin/flock - the FILELOCK program
ok, what is flock then if it's not the browser
yes - but osx 10.6 doesnt have it
why would that be a concern in this channel?
